title.narrative: 7.1 ENGAGEMENT/REALISAT RIGHTS G&B

description.narrative: Output 7.1: By 2018, opinion leaders, including youths, strategic partners, institutions, donors and the media are engaged in the promotion and realisation of the rights of girls and boys, which contributes to Environmental Sustainability, Immunization, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Polio Eradication, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 7: By 2018, leaders, communities, families and young people adopt norms and attitudes more favorable to the survival, development, protection and participation of children, including in emergency situations.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 7.1: By 2018, opinion leaders, including youths, strategic partners, institutions, donors and the media are engaged in thepromotion and realisation of the rights of girls and boys
Number of persons trained each year on traditional and social media techniques
Social media engagement scores
Number of innovative digital communication products created per year
Number of discussions addressing the question of child marriage within listening clubs each year
Number of young boys that mentioned child marriage during telephone conversation during participatory broadcasts organised by media partners each year
Number of communication products relating to the rights of women and children produced and disseminated by national media per year
Number of people reached through digital assets of UNICEF (unique website visitors, social media supporters and subscribers, mobile initiatives)
Number of members of the UNICEF virtual community per year
Number of young girls that have used the toll-free number to participate in broadcasts organised by media partners each year
Number of young girls that have addressed the question of child marriage during a telephone conversation during participatory broadcasts organised by media partners each year
